Rarity: Limited Edition

Team-Up: Ghost Rider, Hulk, Wolverine
At the beginning of the game, if all three listed characters are on your force, this game, Spider-Man and the listed characters can use the Fantastic Four, Spider-Man, X-Men and Mystics team abilities.
0 Points
Special Powers
TEAM-UP: GHOST RIDER, HULK, WOLVERINE: At the beginning of the game, if all three listed characters are on your force, this game, Spider-Man and the listed characters can use the Fantastic Four, Spider-Man, X-Men and Mystics team abilities.

I can't help myself: I desperately want to use 50-point (or less) versions of Hulk, Ghost Rider, and Wolverine with this Spider-Man Card and make them all the Fantastic Four-smen of HoX59b Apocalypse, just because. I want to add this: If you put a Hulk with the Underworld TA on the squad, The "Fantastic Four" can all copy the TA with the Spider-Man (Wild Card) TA.
January 13, 2022
Bat-Phreak
@Goop, the great thing about Team-Up Cards is they only specify *1* specific figure need be used, in this case FF F4001 Spider-Man. There are a number of other very good Ghost Riders, Hulks, and Wolverines with the Fantastic Four keyword. A 300-pt team I intend to try will be FF F001 Spidey, F4 053A Ghost Rider, F4 024 Hulk, and AFFE 100 Wolverine. Only Hulk can use Carry (w/ same size figs) so he cannot use his FREE attack; I may look at F4 056e Cho-Hulk and and a FF taxi or a Sidekick and Thing Robot in place of Banner.

Goop
This is my favorite of all the F4 spideys so i'm super happy he got the teamup. Giving the "New fantastic four" all F4 team ability and mystics is really nice. You also keep it the whole game even if one gets KOed. I really like this Team-up but you do have to run the entire team and some of those pieces aren't that great.
